      • findCustomer2

        Customer findCustomer2(Connection con,
                     String email,
                     int projectId)
                       throws SQLException
        Searches for the customer with the email address for the specified project. The search process runs sequential starting with the first email address and ending with the fourth email address. Returns the customer if it's found.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
        sucheKunde
